description: Core reusable UI widgets including loading skeletons and pagination controls for consistent user experience

components.LoadingSkeletons: Static factory class providing animated loading skeleton widgets for various UI components.

components._TicketItemSkeleton: Private widget creating realistic ticket list item skeleton with proper spacing and dimensions.

components._AppointmentItemSkeleton: Private widget creating appointment list item skeleton with time section and content layout.

components._ShimmerBox: Private animated shimmer widget using SingleTickerProviderStateMixin for smooth loading animations.

rules: Static factory class providing instant UI feedback during data loading operations.
Specialized skeleton widgets for tickets, appointments, data grids, and generic cards.
Realistic skeleton dimensions matching actual UI component layouts for seamless transitions.
AnimationController integration with 1500ms duration and smooth easeInOutSine curve.
LinearGradient shimmer animation with moving light effect from -1.0 to 2.0 range.
AppColors integration maintaining consistent theme colors in loading states.
Configurable item counts for different skeleton types with sensible defaults.
Data grid skeleton supporting variable row and column counts for flexible layouts.
Card skeleton with customizable height and margin for different content types.
Ticket skeleton with proper spacing for ticket number, customer name, service info, and status.
Appointment skeleton with time section and expandable content area layout.
Shimmer box animation with configurable width, height, and border radius.
SingleTickerProviderStateMixin for optimal animation performance and resource management.
Proper animation disposal preventing memory leaks in skeleton components.
Visual placeholder consistency matching real component structure and spacing.
Border and shadow styling matching actual UI components for realistic loading experience.
AppColors.surfaceLight integration for consistent skeleton background colors.
Repeating animation loop creating continuous shimmer effect during loading states.

components.PaginationControls: Reusable pagination widget with navigation controls, page info, and items per page selector.

rules: Comprehensive pagination controls with first, previous, next, and last page navigation.
Items per page dropdown with configurable options (10, 25, 50, 100) and default 25.
Dynamic pagination state management with current page, total pages, and navigation capabilities.
AppColors and AppTextStyles integration for consistent theming and typography.
Disabled state handling with visual feedback for unavailable navigation actions.
Pagination info display showing current page and total page count with proper formatting.
Icon button controls with tooltips for improved accessibility and user experience.
Dropdown items per page selector with callback for handling selection changes.
Border top styling creating visual separation from main content area.
Responsive layout with spacer ensuring proper alignment of pagination elements.
Color state management showing enabled/disabled states with AppColors.primaryBlue and AppColors.textLight.
Page indicator container with border and background highlighting current position.
Callback functions for all navigation actions supporting external state management.
StatelessWidget design with external state management for optimal performance.
Professional pagination styling suitable for data tables and list views.
Configurable items per page options allowing customization for different data sets.
Null-safe callback handling preventing errors when navigation actions are unavailable.
